Printer

An open source kit for exploring the possibilities of internet-of-things printing.

The best background is the introductory blog post. In a nutshell, itâ€™s a software system that makes it easy for YOU to:

  • build your own small internet-connected printers
  • produce customised content for them, and
  • share that content with other people who also have small internet-connected printers.

Read more about it in the introductory blog post, in the wiki or go straight to the source.

You can also get news and updates from @gfrprinter and the mailing list.

Send us a message or draw us a picture and it will be printed in our office.
